unsigned int tri [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int main ( ) { unsigned int n , l , i , j , total ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; if ( n = 0 ) printf ( "0
" ) ; while ( n > 0 ) { total = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & l ) ; if ( n = l ) printf ( "0
" ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < l ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & tri [ i ] [ j ] ) ; if ( j > 0 && i > 0 && j < i ) { tri [ i ] [ j ] += tri [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] > tri [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ? tri [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] : tri [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } else if ( j == 0 ) { tri [ i ] [ j ] += tri [ i - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; } else if ( j == i ) { tri [ i ] [ j ] += tri [ i - i ] [ j - 1 ] ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < l ; i ++ ) { total = total > tri [ l - 1 ] [ i ] ? total : tri [ l - 1 ] [ i ] ; } printf ( "%d
" , total ) ; n -- ; } return 0 ; }
